TopicTitle: Keep the flat area around Dirt Island Runway

Articles.Content:
I saw the changes to the Dirt Runway Island in the preview videos, and it was pretty much the first time I was disappointed with an update.

If you haven't seen it, it's in this video here.

With the runway being narrow, and far of the ground, most of my landings are made on the flat space around it to ensure safety.

Plus, it's a nice place for people testing boats (stock and jet powered, or otherwise) intended for Laythe or Eve to make a run to.

The new, cliff edged site does not look very boat friendly.

The old one had a nice, beachy island kind of feel. It had wide ocean views.

From the preview, it looks like any other place on Kerbin.

I say it is worth reconsidering the changes to that island for the released version, or if it is too late, reverting it for the version after that.

For the record, this is the only disappointing thing, so that's probably a good sign.

Edited July 20, 2013 by Tw1

­

Edited February 11, 2023 by CREEDOFTROLLS

Protests are always sucky.

BRING IN THE RIOT-CONTROL!
Why did they remove the easter egg?
I don't understand what there is to not like. not like proper boats are a stock feature.
You are going up a hill side, or over a hill to land on it. That doesn't really increase the level of difficulty all that much.

You are going up a hill side, or over a hill to land on it. That doesn't really increase the level of difficulty all that much.

I think he's more or less complaning about the lack of "boat friendly-ness"

True, but boats and amphibious vehicles are still something many of us do. And there's still the option to recover a landing that didn't go so well by landing beside the runway, if the ground is a lot flatter.

It seems odd to remove usefulness.

Plus it's less interesting to change it from beach like, to plain old Kerbin grass.

Edited July 20, 2013 by Tw1
I wonder why it was changed, you're right i prefer the old runway, i hear magic boulder is gone too and i never saw it.

i hear magic boulder is gone too and i never saw it.

That was unintended. Nova replied to a post about that, not knowing it got removed, so it might be in .21 if he got around to fixing it.

I don't even care that the location got moved because the new ASAS will make flying 10x easier. what I don't get is why they removed the easter eggs and changed the runway color to green. what was the point? that runway was the only thing this game had as a nice decoration of civilization. and now it just blends in too much with the ground

I thought the green was just they hadn't rendered it properly for the preview version. Perhaps its the same with the terrain, and something mucked it up, and they didn't go an flatten it in time.

It would be nice to get some confirmation for this.

That was unintended. Nova replied to a post about that, not knowing it got removed, so it might be in .21 if he got around to fixing it.

Not really touched the game since early in .20 when my time off started, so I think it might still be gone. I haven't looked recently, though.
Good lord the far edge of that runway and texture choice. I sure hope it isn't like that on release, it's horrific.
Man I really liked the old runway
Its the same runway since .18 they just changed the island.

­

Edited February 11, 2023 by CREEDOFTROLLS
Yes, it's the changes to the island that are the negative thing here.
Hopefully the tweeks Bac9 is makeing, mentioned in the news thing, include some landscaping.
If possible, I would like to know what motivated the change. Something to do with the way terrain is generated? Did they lose the flat area that way?
